name: horticulturist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who studies or grows garden plants: The Institute is hiring two full-time horticulturists to maintain its garden. He was a self-taught garden designer and an enthusiastic horticulturalist. See
horticulture
More examplesFewer examplesThey work as animal keepers, horticulturists, and grounds maintenance workers.Nicholson is a horticulturist overseeing pesticide-free parks for the city. The film-maker lives with his wife, Jane, a horticulturist and landscape gardener.A horticulturalist in Florida produced a low-carb potato.
